entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
